header.name: chaos/preprocessor/facilities/abbr.h
header.author: Paul Mensonides
header.overview: The header defines a macro used to abbreviate interface macros.

macro.abstract: The macro is used to abbreviate library interface macros.

usage.param: The unprefixed name of a library primitive.

macro.para:
This macro prefixes id with CHAOS_PP_. It is intended to be is passed as an argument to another macro such that it can be used as an abbreviation of the prefix CHAOS_PP_. For example,
#define INTERFACE(arg) IMPLEMENTATION(, arg) #define IMPLEMENTATION(_, arg) _(APPLY)(arg)
INTERFACE(...) // INTERFACE((const) // const
The argument id is not allowed to expand prior to prefixing.
